Description:
Trying to be part of the next great online game? That’s what we do.
At Arkadium our purpose is to have fun while creating fun - and that’s exactly what we’ve been doing for 20 years. We’re the creators behind the world’s most-played games. From the Solitaire that came on your Windows machine, to hundreds of other games you’ve come to know and love - you can find our games on Arkadium.com, iOS, Android, and lots of other big sites worldwide.
As a proud Evergreen business our values of Fierce Drive, Positive Energy and Living Full Lives are the driving force behind how we run and the choices we make.
We’re privately held (aka stable and reasonable about growth), founder-led (aka passionate about our craft) and we consistently rank as a “Best Place to Work” (aka not your typical games company).

Description:
ISPROX is a H. R. Consultancy Group specialized in the recruitment of Talent for business organizations. We aim to select talent for companies that best care for human capital and believe in talent!!

Our Client:
Our client is an important Portuguese Group that occupies a position of reference in the European paper distribution market and holds prominent positions in the distribution of packaging and visual communication, with annual sales of approximately 1.4 Billion euros.
It is the only Portuguese multinational company listed in the paper distribution sector in Europe.
With a team of 1800 employees, our client operates in 10 countries - Germany, France, Spain, Portugal, Belgium, Luxembourg, Austria, the Netherlands, Turkey and Angola.

Siemens Digital Industries is an innovation leader in automation and digitalization!
By connecting real and digital worlds, and combining the power of hardware and software, Siemens Digital Industries helps our customers fully exploit the potential of data for their business.

Our portfolio includes companies of all sizes and product types, end-to-end solutions, and services to integrate and digitize the entire value chain. Optimized to meet the specific needs of each industry, they support our customers in reducing their development time and increasing the flexibility, productivity, and environmental efficiency of their production processes.

With the collaboration of almost 75,000 employees worldwide, we build technologies that take society further!

Description:
Acreditas no poder dos dados e da tecnologia para alavancar uma melhor prática e dinâmica na saúde?
Queres fazer da evidencia da realidade a base de todas os processos de decisão em saúde? Sonhas com a aplicação de toda a capacidade da inteligência artificial e novas tecnologias de data science na saúde?
O que é mais importante do que a vida, a nossa individual, a da nossa família, amigos e da sociedade em geral? Nada! Então concluímos que não existe melhor setor, melhor área da sociedade para colocarmos a nossa energia, paixão e conhecimentos do que na saúde!
Então junta-te a nós!! Somos uma empresa jovem, pioneira e disruptiva que acredita que esta transformação já começou e, estando ainda no início, nós seguimos no pelotão da frente!!

Description:
Process mining data engineer
As a process mining data engineer, you are part of the center of excellence for business intelligence front-end tools at Siemens Healthineers IT. The CoE’s prime goal is to support the organization globally in all areas of Power BI, Qlik Sense, Celonis, Valsight and other tools by providing training, guidance, consulting, development, and application management to drive self-service analytics and digitalization.
In your role as data engineer, you are responsible for the back end of the process mining platforms and enablement of process mining solutions. You will be a founding member of our future process mining service and therefore play crucial part in establishing a companywide new service which will enable us to tackle the most complicated process mining use cases with state-of-the-art technology.

Description:
Please visit our career page to apply: https://leafwell.com/careers/
The Data Engineer will be in charge of creating and orchestrating the Leafwell data pipeline, which means gathering data, creating & automating data transformations, and producing actionable insights for Leafwell’s internal stakeholders. Responsibilities also include supporting critical testing and rollout of new data features. The objective of the Data Engineer role is to build and maintain systems that inform Leafwell’s business stakeholders about Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and suggest data-driven strategies to optimize those metrics.
At Leafwell, we believe cannabis is medicine, and our mission is to unlock the therapeutic potential of the plant by increasing access, research, and education.

Description:
This is your opportunity to be an integral part of the central data science team within Kuehne+Nagel which designs and implements our data science and AI solutions in the area of predictive scheduling and real-time tracking, dynamic pricing, demand forecast and warehouse replenishment, churn prediction, fraud and anomaly detection. From Porto, you shape infrastructure, tools and processes to enable our data scientists and provide the building blocks of our AI products. Sounds like a perfect next step in your career? Read on!
Your Role
You will design and set up a modern data architecture for our data science team, fitting the needs of a data driven logistics enterprise, and ensure that cloud-based infrastructure are utilized as efficiently as possible across data science products and projects. You champion practices like Infrastructure-as-Code and GitOps within the data science team, and integrate it with surrounding infrastructure and processes.

Description:
About Us
At Cloudflare, we have our eyes set on an ambitious goal: to help build a better Internet. Today the company runs one of the world's largest networks that powers approximately 25 million Internet properties, for customers ranging from individual bloggers to SMBs to Fortune 500 companies. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware, installing software, or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare all have web traffic routed through its intelligent global network, which gets smarter with every request. As a result, they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks. Cloudflare was named to Entrepreneur Magazine's Top Company Cultures list and ranked among the World's Most Innovative Companies by Fast Company.
We realize people do not fit into neat boxes. We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills, and we are ready to help you do that. We cannot complete our mission without building a diverse and inclusive team. We hire the best people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time at Cloudflare. Come join us!

Description:
The team you’ll be part of
CFO is a diverse team at the frontline, delivering finance and business services, investor relations, and more across the world. Are you passionate about digital transformation, value openness and want to influence the direction of Nokia? Then, you may be the right fit!
As a Senior Data Engineer in Digitalization & Automation, you will be part of the Data Semantics team and work together with other Data Scientists and Engineers. You will have the opportunity to learn on-the-job from day one about business processes and support different activities within data analytics and data engineering.
Throughout the time, you will learn and support the process of enhancing the capabilities in the Data Semantics, always in close collaboration with internal stakeholders and Senior Data Scientists or Engineers. You will perform reverse engineering on existing SAP data and data from other IT systems and perform data transformations to build and validate the semantic business data model of Nokia.

Description:
We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so we can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.

Tripadvisor, the world’s largest travel site, operates at scale with over 1 billion reviews, opinions, photos, and videos reaching millions of unique visitors each month. We are a data driven company that leverages our data to empower our decisions. Hospitality Solutions is focused on delivering TripAdvisor’s first-in-class B2B products that serve a growing market of business owners and partners across the hospitality industry. As a member of the Hospitality Solutions Data Team , you will collaborate with engineering and business stakeholders to build, optimize, maintain, and secure the full data vertical including tracking instrumentation, information architecture, ETL pipelines, and tooling that provide key analytics insights for business-critical decisions at the highest levels of Product, Finance, Sales, CRM, Marketing, Data Science, and more. Your work will power the market research, funnel analysis, product performance, forecasting and modeling that will grow our business and that of our customers. All in a dynamic environment of continuously modernizing tech stack including highly scalable architecture, cloud-based infrastructure, and real-time responsiveness. Tripadvisor provides a unique, global work environment that captures the innovation and excitement of a startup, at a thriving, growing and well-established industry brand. We take pride in our data engineering and are looking for a talented and motivated engineer with a passion for solving interesting problems to add to our team.

What You'll Do


\_\_We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates.

Description:
Lissabon, Porto
Diconium ist Spezialist in den Gebieten Daten und Künstliche Intelligenz. Ob in den Bereichen Search, Social und Content, Personalisierung und Analytics, Data Engineering oder Data Science – unsere Expertise hilft unseren Kunden, die richtigen Daten zum richtigen Zeitpunkt zu erheben, Services und Angebote zu prognostizieren und somit datengetriebene Entscheidungen zu fällen. Werde Teil der diconium data-Familie und unterstütze uns auf unserer Data & AI-Reise!

Du unterstützt unsere Kunden bei der einfachen und transparenten Beschaffung der erforderlichen Daten, um intelligente Data-Produkte in verschiedenen Bereichen (Mobilität, Automobil, Industrie, Consumer, Finanzwesen und Non-Profit-Organisationen) zu entwickeln.

Description:
Somos uma empresa de todos e para todos. Com uma base sólida e inclusiva, a MC mantém o foco nas pessoas, para tornar a vida mais simples a clientes, colaboradores ou membros das comunidades. Criamos valor com o contributo de todos, inovamos a cada passo e lideramos de forma próxima, atentos às qualidades e necessidades de cada um. Temos histórias diferentes e ideias diferentes, mas partilhamos o desejo de crescer e de chegar à melhor versão de nós próprios. Tudo o que somos, conseguimos juntos. E não há nada mais inspirador do que isso. #BETTERTOGETHER

Estamos à procura de quem quer desafiar-se a ser Data Engineer (m/f), para a nossa equipa do Cartão Continente e acreditamos que seremos #BETTERWITHYOU.

Description:
Do you want to help change one of the largest industries in the world to become more efficient and also improve the conditions for all of us?

Then you’re in the right place! Parsly, launched in mid-2021, is a tech company focused on providing easy-to-use tools powered by the latest technologies, and enabling restauranteurs to focus on their passion - creating amazing food and experiences for their guests. We are a young company with great ambitions and strong financiers backing and empowering us to realise our vision. We help restaurants save both money and time. All this while giving them the conditions to work more sustainably with reduced food waste and a huge positive environmental impact as a result!
We are based in Sweden and Portugal and want to grow our incredible team!

Description:
Your mission
We’re looking for a talented and team player Data Engineer for our Porto office!
This role will involve development and maintenance of our data repositories, pipeline and analytical solutions.

The ideal candidate is self driven and is looking to build high quality tools to provide actionable insights to our business managers and facilitate data-driven decision making. The candidate will also need to know how to leverage technology tools while protecting user data through compliance with privacy standards & regulations.

And furthermore, we're looking for someone excited about re-imagining insurance worldwide, helping to build a long-lasting company with us at Lovys!

Description:
Trying to be part of the next great online game? That’s what we do.
At Arkadium our purpose is to have fun while creating fun - and that’s exactly what we’ve been doing for 20 years. We’re the creators behind the world’s most-played games. From the Solitaire that came on your Windows machine, to hundreds of other games you’ve come to know and love - you can find our games on Arkadium.com, iOS, Android, and lots of other big sites worldwide.
As a proud Evergreen business our values of Fierce Drive, Positive Energy and Living Full Lives are the driving force behind how we run and the choices we make.
We’re privately held (aka stable and reasonable about growth), founder-led (aka passionate about our craft) and we consistently rank as a “Best Place to Work” (aka not your typical games company).

Hala Systems, Inc. is a social enterprise working to transform the nature of protection and accountability in the world’s toughest places by democratizing advanced defense, sensing, and artificial intelligence technology. Our team works across the globe and hails from over 15 countries. We speak over 20 languages and have studied and worked in leading educational, business, research and government institutions. We are mission-driven thinkers, and we share a deep respect for each other and for the communities that partner with us.

Our client is an important Portuguese Group that occupies a position of reference in the European paper distribution market and holds prominent positions in the distribution of packaging and visual communication, with annual sales of approximately 1.4 Billion euros.
It is the only Portuguese multinational company listed in the paper distribution sector in Europe.
With a team of 1800 employees, our client operates in 10 countries - Germany, France, Spain, Portugal, Belgium, Luxembourg, Austria, the Netherlands, Turkey and Angola.

Description:
Acreditas no poder dos dados e da tecnologia para alavancar uma melhor prática e dinâmica na saúde?
Queres fazer da evidencia da realidade a base de todas os processos de decisão em saúde? Sonhas com a aplicação de toda a capacidade da inteligência artificial e novas tecnologias de data science na saúde?
O que é mais importante do que a vida, a nossa individual, a da nossa família, amigos e da sociedade em geral? Nada! Então concluímos que não existe melhor setor, melhor área da sociedade para colocarmos a nossa energia, paixão e conhecimentos do que na saúde!
Então junta-te a nós!! Somos uma empresa jovem, pioneira e disruptiva que acredita que esta transformação já começou e, estando ainda no início, nós seguimos no pelotão da frente!!

M/F

DESAFIO:
Desenvolver métodos e processos que garantam que os dados estejam organizados de forma correta (modelos de dados consistentes e normalizados) e segura, bem como garantir a qualidade dos dados que são armazenados, preparados e disponibilizados (através da construção de pipelines) para usos analíticos e/ou operacionais.

RESPONSABILIDADES:

Description:
Process mining data engineer
As a process mining data engineer, you are part of the center of excellence for business intelligence front-end tools at Siemens Healthineers IT. The CoE’s prime goal is to support the organization globally in all areas of Power BI, Qlik Sense, Celonis, Valsight and other tools by providing training, guidance, consulting, development, and application management to drive self-service analytics and digitalization.
In your role as data engineer, you are responsible for the back end of the process mining platforms and enablement of process mining solutions. You will be a founding member of our future process mining service and therefore play crucial part in establishing a companywide new service which will enable us to tackle the most complicated process mining use cases with state-of-the-art technology.

Description:
Please visit our career page to apply: https://leafwell.com/careers/
The Data Engineer will be in charge of creating and orchestrating the Leafwell data pipeline, which means gathering data, creating & automating data transformations, and producing actionable insights for Leafwell’s internal stakeholders. Responsibilities also include supporting critical testing and rollout of new data features. The objective of the Data Engineer role is to build and maintain systems that inform Leafwell’s business stakeholders about Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and suggest data-driven strategies to optimize those metrics.
At Leafwell, we believe cannabis is medicine, and our mission is to unlock the therapeutic potential of the plant by increasing access, research, and education.

Description:
This is your opportunity to be an integral part of the central data science team within Kuehne+Nagel which designs and implements our data science and AI solutions in the area of predictive scheduling and real-time tracking, dynamic pricing, demand forecast and warehouse replenishment, churn prediction, fraud and anomaly detection. From Porto, you shape infrastructure, tools and processes to enable our data scientists and provide the building blocks of our AI products. Sounds like a perfect next step in your career? Read on!
Your Role
You will design and set up a modern data architecture for our data science team, fitting the needs of a data driven logistics enterprise, and ensure that cloud-based infrastructure are utilized as efficiently as possible across data science products and projects. You champion practices like Infrastructure-as-Code and GitOps within the data science team, and integrate it with surrounding infrastructure and processes.

Description:
About Us
At Cloudflare, we have our eyes set on an ambitious goal: to help build a better Internet. Today the company runs one of the world's largest networks that powers approximately 25 million Internet properties, for customers ranging from individual bloggers to SMBs to Fortune 500 companies. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware, installing software, or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare all have web traffic routed through its intelligent global network, which gets smarter with every request. As a result, they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks. Cloudflare was named to Entrepreneur Magazine's Top Company Cultures list and ranked among the World's Most Innovative Companies by Fast Company.
We realize people do not fit into neat boxes. We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills, and we are ready to help you do that. We cannot complete our mission without building a diverse and inclusive team. We hire the best people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time at Cloudflare. Come join us!

Description:
The team you’ll be part of
CFO is a diverse team at the frontline, delivering finance and business services, investor relations, and more across the world. Are you passionate about digital transformation, value openness and want to influence the direction of Nokia? Then, you may be the right fit!
As a Senior Data Engineer in Digitalization & Automation, you will be part of the Data Semantics team and work together with other Data Scientists and Engineers. You will have the opportunity to learn on-the-job from day one about business processes and support different activities within data analytics and data engineering.
Throughout the time, you will learn and support the process of enhancing the capabilities in the Data Semantics, always in close collaboration with internal stakeholders and Senior Data Scientists or Engineers. You will perform reverse engineering on existing SAP data and data from other IT systems and perform data transformations to build and validate the semantic business data model of Nokia.

Description:
We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so we can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.

Tripadvisor, the world’s largest travel site, operates at scale with over 1 billion reviews, opinions, photos, and videos reaching millions of unique visitors each month. We are a data driven company that leverages our data to empower our decisions. Hospitality Solutions is focused on delivering TripAdvisor’s first-in-class B2B products that serve a growing market of business owners and partners across the hospitality industry. As a member of the Hospitality Solutions Data Team , you will collaborate with engineering and business stakeholders to build, optimize, maintain, and secure the full data vertical including tracking instrumentation, information architecture, ETL pipelines, and tooling that provide key analytics insights for business-critical decisions at the highest levels of Product, Finance, Sales, CRM, Marketing, Data Science, and more. Your work will power the market research, funnel analysis, product performance, forecasting and modeling that will grow our business and that of our customers. All in a dynamic environment of continuously modernizing tech stack including highly scalable architecture, cloud-based infrastructure, and real-time responsiveness. Tripadvisor provides a unique, global work environment that captures the innovation and excitement of a startup, at a thriving, growing and well-established industry brand. We take pride in our data engineering and are looking for a talented and motivated engineer with a passion for solving interesting problems to add to our team.

What You'll Do


\_\_We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates.

Description:
Lissabon, Porto
Diconium ist Spezialist in den Gebieten Daten und Künstliche Intelligenz. Ob in den Bereichen Search, Social und Content, Personalisierung und Analytics, Data Engineering oder Data Science – unsere Expertise hilft unseren Kunden, die richtigen Daten zum richtigen Zeitpunkt zu erheben, Services und Angebote zu prognostizieren und somit datengetriebene Entscheidungen zu fällen. Werde Teil der diconium data-Familie und unterstütze uns auf unserer Data & AI-Reise!
Deine Aufgaben
Du unterstützt unsere Kunden bei der einfachen und transparenten Beschaffung der erforderlichen Daten, um intelligente Data-Produkte in verschiedenen Bereichen (Mobilität, Automobil, Industrie, Consumer, Finanzwesen und Non-Profit-Organisationen) zu entwickeln.

Description:
Trying to be part of the next great online game? That’s what we do.
At Arkadium our purpose is to have fun while creating fun - and that’s exactly what we’ve been doing for 20 years. We’re the creators behind the world’s most-played games. From the Solitaire that came on your Windows machine, to hundreds of other games you’ve come to know and love - you can find our games on Arkadium.com, iOS, Android, and lots of other big sites worldwide.
As a proud Evergreen business our values of Fierce Drive, Positive Energy and Living Full Lives are the driving force behind how we run and the choices we make.

Description:
Acreditas no poder dos dados e da tecnologia para alavancar uma melhor prática e dinâmica na saúde?
Queres fazer da evidencia da realidade a base de todas os processos de decisão em saúde? Sonhas com a aplicação de toda a capacidade da inteligência artificial e novas tecnologias de data science na saúde?
O que é mais importante do que a vida, a nossa individual, a da nossa família, amigos e da sociedade em geral? Nada! Então concluímos que não existe melhor setor, melhor área da sociedade para colocarmos a nossa energia, paixão e conhecimentos do que na saúde!
Então junta-te a nós!! Somos uma empresa jovem, pioneira e disruptiva que acredita que esta transformação já começou e, estando ainda no início, nós seguimos no pelotão da frente!!

M/F

DESAFIO:
Desenvolver métodos e processos que garantam que os dados estejam organizados de forma correta (modelos de dados consistentes e normalizados) e segura, bem como garantir a qualidade dos dados que são armazenados, preparados e disponibilizados (através da construção de pipelines) para usos analíticos e/ou operacionais.

Description:
Process mining data engineer
As a process mining data engineer, you are part of the center of excellence for business intelligence front-end tools at Siemens Healthineers IT. The CoE’s prime goal is to support the organization globally in all areas of Power BI, Qlik Sense, Celonis, Valsight and other tools by providing training, guidance, consulting, development, and application management to drive self-service analytics and digitalization.
In your role as data engineer, you are responsible for the back end of the process mining platforms and enablement of process mining solutions. You will be a founding member of our future process mining service and therefore play crucial part in establishing a companywide new service which will enable us to tackle the most complicated process mining use cases with state-of-the-art technology.

Description:

Your Role
You will design and set up a modern data architecture for our data science team, fitting the needs of a data driven logistics enterprise, and ensure that cloud-based infrastructure are utilized as efficiently as possible across data science products and projects. You champion practices like Infrastructure-as-Code and GitOps within the data science team, and integrate it with surrounding infrastructure and processes.

Description:
Please visit our career page to apply: https://leafwell.com/careers/
The Data Engineer will be in charge of creating and orchestrating the Leafwell data pipeline, which means gathering data, creating & automating data transformations, and producing actionable insights for Leafwell’s internal stakeholders. Responsibilities also include supporting critical testing and rollout of new data features. The objective of the Data Engineer role is to build and maintain systems that inform Leafwell’s business stakeholders about Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and suggest data-driven strategies to optimize those metrics.
At Leafwell, we believe cannabis is medicine, and our mission is to unlock the therapeutic potential of the plant by increasing access, research, and education.

Description:
About Us
At Cloudflare, we have our eyes set on an ambitious goal: to help build a better Internet. Today the company runs one of the world's largest networks that powers approximately 25 million Internet properties, for customers ranging from individual bloggers to SMBs to Fortune 500 companies. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware, installing software, or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare all have web traffic routed through its intelligent global network, which gets smarter with every request. As a result, they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks. Cloudflare was named to Entrepreneur Magazine's Top Company Cultures list and ranked among the World's Most Innovative Companies by Fast Company.
We realize people do not fit into neat boxes. We are looking for curious and empathetic individuals who are committed to developing themselves and learning new skills, and we are ready to help you do that. We cannot complete our mission without building a diverse and inclusive team. We hire the best people based on an evaluation of their potential and support them throughout their time at Cloudflare. Come join us!

Description:
The team you’ll be part of
CFO is a diverse team at the frontline, delivering finance and business services, investor relations, and more across the world. Are you passionate about digital transformation, value openness and want to influence the direction of Nokia? Then, you may be the right fit!
As a Senior Data Engineer in Digitalization & Automation, you will be part of the Data Semantics team and work together with other Data Scientists and Engineers. You will have the opportunity to learn on-the-job from day one about business processes and support different activities within data analytics and data engineering.
Throughout the time, you will learn and support the process of enhancing the capabilities in the Data Semantics, always in close collaboration with internal stakeholders and Senior Data Scientists or Engineers. You will perform reverse engineering on existing SAP data and data from other IT systems and perform data transformations to build and validate the semantic business data model of Nokia.

Description:
We believe that we are better together, and at Tripadvisor we welcome you for who you are. Our workplace is for everyone, as is our people powered platform. At Tripadvisor, we want you to bring your unique identities, abilities, and experiences, so we can collectively revolutionize travel and together find the good out there.

Tripadvisor, the world’s largest travel site, operates at scale with over 1 billion reviews, opinions, photos, and videos reaching millions of unique visitors each month. We are a data driven company that leverages our data to empower our decisions. Hospitality Solutions is focused on delivering TripAdvisor’s first-in-class B2B products that serve a growing market of business owners and partners across the hospitality industry. As a member of the Hospitality Solutions Data Team , you will collaborate with engineering and business stakeholders to build, optimize, maintain, and secure the full data vertical including tracking instrumentation, information architecture, ETL pipelines, and tooling that provide key analytics insights for business-critical decisions at the highest levels of Product, Finance, Sales, CRM, Marketing, Data Science, and more. Your work will power the market research, funnel analysis, product performance, forecasting and modeling that will grow our business and that of our customers. All in a dynamic environment of continuously modernizing tech stack including highly scalable architecture, cloud-based infrastructure, and real-time responsiveness. Tripadvisor provides a unique, global work environment that captures the innovation and excitement of a startup, at a thriving, growing and well-established industry brand. We take pride in our data engineering and are looking for a talented and motivated engineer with a passion for solving interesting problems to add to our team.

What You'll Do


\_\_We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates.

Description:
Job Description

As one of the world's leading mobility providers, our mission at SIXT is to serve our customers with their desired vehicle whenever, wherever and for as long as they need, with a clear focus on Experience, Value, and Convenience. To fulfill this mission we use Data as the only way to make decisions and run our internal processes, digital experiences, and customer touchpoints. With a presence in over 100 countries, we serve millions of customers and collect hundreds of millions of data points across many digital channels. Our Consumer Analytics Engineering team is at the forefront of creating deep insights into our product journeys and the experience of our users. Those insights are key for all our product decisions and are our north star for creating additional value for our customers globally. As a Staff Data Engineer (m/f/d) in the team, you will be the technical leader of a newly-formed, highly-motivated crew, which has the mission of building and developing the OLAP layer for our Consumer Products engineering division, responsible for all our digital experience products. The goal is to provide a highly automated self-service analytics platform for both batch and near-real time streaming workflows.

Hala Systems, Inc. is a social enterprise working to transform the nature of protection and accountability in the world’s toughest places by democratizing advanced defense, sensing, and artificial intelligence technology. Hala is currently saving lives, reducing trauma, and improving resilience for millions of people.
Our team works across the globe and hails from over 15 countries. We speak over 20 languages and have studied and worked in leading educational, business, research and government institutions. We are mission-driven thinkers, and we share a deep respect for each other and for the communities that partner with us.
